short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your opened tabs and revisit them later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Session Capture helps you manage opened tabs. When you're browsing related contents and want to preserve those links for future reference Session Capture helps you do just that. Save all your tabs under the same heading. Easy to manage your valuable findings. Extremely simple user interface for fast and easy experience. Any suggestions on improvements is highly appreciated.
